Binary mirror config for [prebuild](https://github.com/mafintosh/prebuild) and [node-pre-gyp](https://github.com/mapbox/node-pre-gyp)

## Mirrors

- China: https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/
  - CDN prefix: https://cdn.npm.taobao.org/dist/
